import React,{useState}from'react';import'../css/navigationbar.css';import'../css/SwitchCodeGenerator.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const templates={'8':`hostname {{HOSTNAME}}
interface Vlan102

!
banner motd ^C
{{ASSET_TAG}}
^C
end
`,'24':`hostname {{HOSTNAME}}
interface Vlan102
 ip address {{MGMT_IP}} 255.255.255.0

!

{{ASSET_TAG}}

SwitchCodeGenerator=()=>{const[model,setModel]=useState('8');const[form,setForm]=useState({HOSTNAME:'',MGMT_IP:'',PHONE_IP:'',ASSET_TAG:''});const[generated,setGenerated]=useState('');const
